views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 to 12.4

CCLessStatusBAR Hides the Status Bar on the Control Center of the iPhone X and the Chevron of other Devices on System Wide!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below.

Thanks to my Brother @lorenzo_noide for testing the Final Release.

Requested by iSHQ!P on Twitter.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.2
- Added Support Compatibility till iOS 12.4 and arm64e/A12 Devices.
